summary: A mercenary-for-hire accepts a mission from a billionaire to capture a dangerous snake that could possibly help cure a terminal illness.
cast: David Hasselhoff|Crystal Allen|Ryan McCluskey|Patrick Regis|Anthony Green|John Rhys-Davies|Alan O'Silva|Toma Danila|Bogdan Uritescu|Mihaela Elena Oros|Serban Celea|Zoltan Butuc|Alin Constantinescu|Banica Gheorghe|Gabi Burlacu|Mihai Cazanchevici|Bart Sidles|Silviu Gherman|Cristina Teodorescu|George Chitu|Anca Androne|Vasile Albinet
keywords: anaconda|snakeskin|psychotronic film|woman wears a gas mask|snake
director: Director: Don E. FauntLeRoy (as Don E. Fauntleroy)
title: Anaconda 3: La venganza
